name: Chicken Game New
description:
Chicken Game New is a project that I used to get the hang of Unity.
It supports controller and keyboard. Use the analog stick, WASD or the arrow keys to move around. Use almost any controller face button, space bar or the left mouse button to swing your shovel.

Some enemies will leave a roasted Life Chicken behind. These refill your life bar. 

This game was named by my five-year-old son. It's a silly little game, but I hope that you have fun with it.

Note: The MacOS version is completely untested! I have no idea if it works.
